  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Get the property descriptor path. For simple properties this usually corresponds with the property name. For nested properties this is the full property path, optionally with member descriptors.

      Use getTargetPropertyName() to retrieve the exact property name this descriptor represents.

      Returns:
      property descriptor name

    • getTargetPropertyName

      String getTargetPropertyName()
      Get the target property name that this property descriptor represents. In case of a simple property this is the same as getName(), but for nested properties this will remove the path representing the parent property.

      For example, suppose the descriptor is user.name, which represents a nested property descriptor with parent descriptor user. In this case the target property name would be user.

      Returns:
      target property name

    • getDisplayName

      String getDisplayName()

    • isReadable

      boolean isReadable()

    • isWritable

      boolean isWritable()

    • isHidden

      boolean isHidden()

    • getPropertyType

      Class<?> getPropertyType()

    • getPropertyTypeDescriptor

      org.springframework.core.convert.TypeDescriptor getPropertyTypeDescriptor()
      Returns:
      more detailed information about the property type (supporting generics)

    • getController

      <U, V> EntityPropertyController getController()
      Returns:
      controller for handling this property

    • getValueFetcher

      ValueFetcher getValueFetcher()
      Returns:
      fetcher function that can return the property value directly from a parent (owning) instance

    • getPropertyValue

      Object getPropertyValue(Object entity)
      Retrieve the property value for the entity parameter. This is basically the same as calling {@link #getValueFetcher()#getValue}, except null will be returned if no ValueFetcher is available.
      Parameters:
      entity - from which to get the property value
      Returns:
      property value or null if unable to get

    • getPropertyRegistry

      EntityPropertyRegistry getPropertyRegistry()
      Returns:
      the property registry that owns this property

    • isNestedProperty

      boolean isNestedProperty()
      Returns:
      does this property represent a nested property (getParentDescriptor() will not return null)

    • getParentDescriptor

      EntityPropertyDescriptor getParentDescriptor()
      Returns:
      the parent descriptor in case of a nested property descriptor (isNestedProperty() should return true)

    • builder

      static EntityPropertyDescriptorBuilder builder(String propertyName)
      Create a builder for a new SimpleEntityPropertyDescriptor.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - name of the property (unique within the registry)
      Returns:
      builder instance
